EmailTemplate.subject: Update on your Paint Place application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Paint Place Store Owner,
Thank you for applying to join the WEX Australia Paint Place Group of Stores T-Card merchant network.
As a merchant accepting the T-Card you will enjoy many benefits, including the elimination of credit risk on T-Card customers, a reduction in costs associated with the management of in-house accounts and more time to focus on business growth opportunities.
The payment details section of the form allows you to nominate your required payment terms. Please choose from the options detailed below and indicate your choice in the "Payment Plan" section of your application form.
PAY CYCLE FEE(%)
14 days (from the end of the month) 2.22% (GST excluded)
30 days (from the end of the month) 1.82% (GST excluded)
Once your application has been finalised you will receive a start-up kit containing stationery, operating procedures and a merchant card.
For further information or assistance completing your application, please contact our Merchant Support Team on 1300 130 113.
We look forward to receiving your application and welcoming you to our network.
Yours sincerely,
Tracey Vines
Merchant Support Manager
We see corporate payments differently.
